group_1.textLeft: Since I wasn’t too good at racing,
tearing through the wind on my skates
was a brand-new experience for me!

group_1.textRight: your fateful encounter with inline skating, was it?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah!

group_1.textRight: From that point on, Miyu was hooked.
She quickly improved to the level of being able to participate in competitions.

group_1.textLeft: Ehehe…

group_1.textRight: Is that the freestyle competition you were talking@about earlier?

group_1.textLeft: It is, it is. We use a half-pipe or something as a@ramp!

group_1.textRight: That sounds harder than I thought!

group_1.textLeft: We have to do jumps and stuff, so it’s hard for@sure.
I guess I’d say it looks kinda like a skateboarding competition?
I started out with a pretty good track record.
I even made it to the prefectural championships!
Buuut…
That’s when my social anxiety started to get@worse…

group_1.narration: “I’d always been a pretty shy girl.”
“At some point, I started experiencing strong,@inexplicable panic attacks.”

group_1.textLeft: *pant*… *pant*…
(What’s happening…? It’s like I’m choking… @it hurts…)
(…Oh, I can’t remember how to breathe…)
*huff*… *pant*… *wheeze*…

group_1.narration: “I got so nervous every time I entered a@tournament… Sometimes, when it got really bad,@I felt like I was hyperventilating.”
“I’d make tons of mistakes and get so anxious that@eventually, I reached a point where I couldn’t@compete at all anymore.”
“The very thought of those panic attacks- not@knowing why they happened or when it’d hit me@again- scared me so badly that I’d freeze up.”
“Eventually, my already-timid personality got worse,@ and I started becoming more and more anxious@all the time. It reached the point where it was@interfering with my day-to-day life…”
“My parents were worried about me, so they signed@me up with the Hikarizuka Youth Association to give@me a chance to interact with more people and help@fix my anxiety.”
“That’s when- that’s when I finally met Lady San!”

group_1.textLeft: …What’s with the sudden change of subject?

group_1.textCenter: My name is San Kagura. Pleased to meet you.

group_1.textLeft: I-I’m… Miyuri Yukari! I-it’s n-n-n-nice to meet you@too!

group_1.textRight: Hmhm, there’s no need to be so nervous.

group_1.textLeft: O-okay…
And- and I’ve been- I’ve been captivated by@Lady San
eeeever since I first saw her!

group_1.textRight: Isn’t this a totally different story?
We’ve gotten off-topic from inline skating and@anxiety…

group_1.textLeft: So then, so then…!

group_1.textRight: Ah, jeez, there’s no off switch on this girl.
